summary: This is a simple replacer for the Mage Statue in the College of Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Winterhold Mage statue
Author: Edhildil
09,24,2014
ver1



Note: This is a replacer and has no .esp file so it will not count against your mod count usage if you use or try it.



LOL! This is a Joke mod.

This is a simple replacer for the Mage Statue in the College of Winterhold.

This is mostly just a silly mod but I thought some of you would like it.

It changes the statue of the windswept wizard in the College of Winterhold courtyard to a sexy sorceress.

The new mesh is a hot sexy sculpture of a female sorceress with a flame in one hand and a staff in the other.

She is topless and has a sculpted item on her lower area. She does not have BBP because she is a sculpture.

She is not a follower because she is a scupture.

She might be a vampire or a werewolf but mostly she is a statue, sorta like a sculpture.

She does not come in any other body size because she is made of a marblish stone and is already chisled to her shape.

She does not mind if you do not like her statue because she already has so many others that do, and that is fine with her.

She would like you to visit her and take a picture with her and post it; she is vain because she is a sculpture.

I am using a mod called "College of Winterhold Glory days" in my screenshots.


File:

Data_meshes_clutter_statues_magestatue


Bugs:

The statue won't change if you use a mod that redirects the original mesh filepath.

She shares the same body texture as my Meridia mod, they can overwrite each other safely so do not worry about conflicts with mod manager warnings or saying "yes" at an overwrite prompt upon install if you use both mods.

My other statue mods:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55601/?]Edhildils Meridia Statue[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55398/?]Edhildils Nocturnal statue[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55220/?]Edhildils Sexy Azura Statue[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55167/?]Sevenbase Dibella statue[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55195/?]Sexy Mara statue[/url]



Tools:

Blender
Nifscope
FRAPS
Microsoft Paint (BMP to JPEG for screenies)

Credits:

Edhildil (statue)
Apachii (female hair mesh #04)
Sevenity (sevenbase body)
Bethesda (original statue mesh)

Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

Usage:

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
